alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hancock; Taliaferro; Warren (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 7:26PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Warren, northeastern Hancock, southeastern Greene and southern Taliaferro Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 725 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over White Plains, or 7 miles southwest of Crawfordville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Warrenton, Crawfordville, White Plains, Siloam, Norwood, Sharon, Camak, Springfield, Cadley, Robinson, Jewell, Mayfield, Powelton, Barnett and Alexander Stephens Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM EDT for east central Georgia.
